build.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y libzip-dev libpng-dev libjpeg-dev libfreetype6-dev && docker-php-ext-configure gd --with-freetype --with-jpeg && docker-php-ext-install -j$(nproc) zip gd pdo pdo_mysql mbstring xml exif pcntl && composer install --optimize-autoloader --no-scripts --no-interaction
